overview:
Marc Pickren, a former executive with J. Walter Thompson and Monster Worldwide (formerly TMP Worldwide), is the founder and President of Enversa Companies. Mr. Pickren has proven himself a highly successful marketer and business leader. While at J.Walter Thompson, Mr. Pickren was responsible for brand development at The Department of Education as well as founding a direct response practice. Mr. Pickren added over forty million dollars in incremental revenue from technology applications that he designed while at Monster Worldwide, all while assisting with the transitioning to its current public status.

Founder of an online media company theleadstream.com, created proprietary rich media container ad unit (onequestionnetwork.com), working on a proprietary reverse “zombie” for helping law enforcement catch predators and online offenders (enversecure), transitioned company to public status in 2008. Marketer of reverse auction system for buying and selling online media.
